title: Nautilus Q Hitbox could use some adjustments...
body:
This hit Sona. It was at  the very end of its hitbox but it's literally on top of Jhin. What?
Here's another one thats slightly less BS but still (and can't post 2 links apparently): https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/368951151745564672/584220112857333818/unknown.png

replies.body: Naut should be allowed to pull in two enemies at once. His anchor has two hooks on it after all. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Oooh, love your name, such a good game! 

{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
Riot's hook hitboxes are actually a line and then circle. They're programmed to check at the end of the hook for a unit they can snag within x distance. This occurs with thresh and blitz as well.
While true, there still needs some adjustments on this one lol. The 1st one hitting Sona and not Jhin is kind of crazy, and should be fixed.
Nautilus needs his hitboxes checked and his numbers nerfed.
